full_description:
Xigmatek AIR-KILLER PRO ARGB CPU Air Cooler

The Xigmatek AIR-KILLER PRO features an ultra-efficient thermal heat pipe and patented Xigmatek H.D.T. Technology. This air cooler can deliver high-performance heat dissipation & airflow. It is equipped with a colorful ARGB LED Top Cover and X22A Fan and comes with Mini ARGB LED Controller Included. it is equipped with a long-life hydraulic bearing & MTTF up to 50,000 Hours. It can deliver Silent Operation at â‰¤25.3 dBA. The Fan Blade design reduces fan noise and the anti-vibration motor minimizes vibration and noise. It has support for an additional 120mm Fan (Support Up to TDP 190W). The Xigmatek AIR-KILLER PRO supports the latest 12th Gen Intel Core desktop processor family and has support for ARGB MB SYNC. It is compatible with LGA 2066/ 2011-V3/ 2011/ 1700/ 115x/ 1200 Socket and AM4/AM3+/AM3 Socket. It ensures non-interference between memory modules and CPU Cooler. The Xigmatek AIR-KILLER PRO comes with a 1-year warranty.

values.value: Heat Sink Material: 4pcs Heat Pipes / Aluminum Fins

full_description:
Xigmatek FROZR-O 240 ARGB AIO Liquid CPU Cooler

Xigmatek FROZR-O 240 ARGB AIO Liquid CPU Cooler comes with a smart OLED Display with Real-Time Pump RPM & Cold Plate Temperature. The FROZE-O AIO liquid CPU cooler Series is Xigmateks latest innovation, bringing you system monitoring capability using the latest OLED display technology. The Alo kit included top-grade components to keep your CPU cool for maximum performance experience, best suitable for gaming or professional overclocked PC system. It has a top-grade pure copper cold plate design that provides effective and stable heat dissipation. The 350mm length with 12mm thickness black sleeved cable is super strong and has a stylish outlook. The RADIATOR is a full aluminum high-density water channel design that can provide optimized heat circulation. The PUMP ceramic axle bearing guarantee less resistance and super long service life, special design 8-pole motor delivers a high flow rate and maintains ultra-quiet operation. The Top grade pure copper cold plate with a full aluminum high-density water channel and the Black sleeved cable has a long service life. The Xigmatek LIQUID-KILLER X 240 comes with an ARGB Controller box included with RF wireless remote controller. It can be used to adjust the fan speed and ARGB lighting. It is compatible with Intel LGA 20xx/1700/1200/115x Socket and AMD AM4/AM3+/AM3 Socket. The Xigmatek AIO cooler has a 120mm ARGB fan and it supports mainstream M/B for Addressable RGB Motherboard SYNC. It also has Smart RGB Remote for controlling various settings. Xigmatek FROZR-O 240 ARGB AIO Liquid CPU Cooler offers a 2-Year Warranty.

product_page_short_description: LED Color: Addressable RGB Support M/B SYNC
full_description:
Xigmatek LIQUID-KILLER X Arctic 360mm ARGB AIO Liquid CPU Cooler

The Xigmatek LIQUID-KILLER X Arctic 360mm ARGB AIO Liquid CPU Cooler is a powerful cooling solution for both aesthetic and performance aficionados. It guarantees efficient heat dissipation with a radiator dimension of 394x120x27mm. The 400mm black sleeved tube gives a sense of refinement to the entire look while also ensuring longevity. The pump, with dimensions of 80x71x50mm and a ceramic bearing, runs at 2800 10% RPM, giving tremendous cooling performance while producing 29dBA of noise. The pump of LIQUID-KILLER X Arctic CPU Cooler features a dynamic visual design ARGB LED pump head, making it a visual highlight, and has a rated voltage of 12VDC and a power consumption of less than 3W. The three 120x120x25mm fans, each with an addressable RGB rainbow lighting display, run at 1800 RPM 10% on a long-life hydraulic bearing. These fans produce 82.2 CFM of airflow and 2.55 mm-H2O of air pressure while producing a comparatively low noise level of 25.3dBA. The CPU cooler is backwards compatible with Intel's LGA 1700/1200 & 115X/2011 & 2066 and AMD's TR4/AM5/AM4/AM3. The Xigmatek LIQUID-KILLER X Arctic 360mm ARGB AIO Liquid CPU Cooler is a fantastic solution to improve both the cooling efficiency and visual appeal of computers for its powerful performance, striking aesthetics, and extensive compatibility.

Buy Xigmatek LIQUID-KILLER X Arctic 360mm ARGB AIO Liquid CPU Cooler From Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get original Xigmatek LIQUID-KILLER X Arctic 360mm ARGB AIO Liquid CPU Cooler From Star Tech. We have a large collection of latest Xigmatek CPU Cooler to purchase. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The Xigmatek LIQUID-KILLER X Arctic 360mm ARGB AIO Liquid CPU Cooler comes with 1 year warranty.
